extendedInfo.description: Real-time flight tracking from the industry leaders. Track flights with 1 endpoint in N. America live & save them to your My Trips list. Get instant alerts when flight status changes. Send your trip itinerary or flight status to others or your calendar. View a national airport delay map & see weather at airports worldwide.  Optimized for phone and tablets!

reviews.title: Best app I\'ve ever downloaded!
reviews.comment: Saves me a ton of time because now I know exactly when my friends & clients are going to land so I don\'t sit in the airport parking lot with my thumb up my butt waiting for them:)
reviews.author: Michael Sullivan

reviews.title: Unable to save Google custom calendar.
reviews.comment: Samsung Galaxy S4 unable to save flights or trips to custom calendar. This worked fine on HTC Evo. Default calendar saves ok, but unable to see my custom \'travel\' calendar.
reviews.author: Hank Osterlund

reviews.title: WTF
reviews.comment: Its working ok now
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Updates are awesome!
reviews.author: Dan Doron

reviews.title: Downloads
reviews.comment: Will not allow me save my trips to calendar
reviews.author: Mike Plummer

reviews.title: No more waiting for a phone call.
reviews.comment: Know exactly when and where your flights are at all times. Go about your day and as soon as the flight you are waiting for lands, you\'ll get notification. Love the real time maps with weather and route. Very good app.
reviews.author: Maria Procaccino

reviews.title: Late alerts
reviews.comment: Recent updated versions regularly alert me to landings and gate arrivals up to an hour after actual times! The alerts used to be the best part.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ability, lacking of.
reviews.comment: Since departure times are relative to the airport why not list what time zone they are in??? Can you please do that? Flights show up as leaving and arriving within minutes the way it is now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Works great! Used it today to track my flight on Spirit which doesn\'t have an app. Worked perfectly!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Missing some airlines
reviews.comment: Missing many of the non domestic flights I am most interested in.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Personal information?
reviews.comment: I don\' t see why this update should need calendar and E-mail access, so I\'m not installing this \"update.\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Most accurate
reviews.comment: Somehow this app always get most up to date information earlier than any other taking service i tried. Sometimes it update information earlier than airport display. Highly recommended if you want to know up to second information about your flight.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Only wish it could parse confirmation emails
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Frequently wrong
reviews.comment: Great app when it works. Often doesn\'t track flights set up in advance. Doesn\'t update in real time. On occasion has shown arrival time as late (by hours) when flight is actually on time or early. Bought full version, yet checking other options.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Sometimes, flights changes lag behind...sometimes they beat the airline making an announcement. Otherwise, great program
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed    - Droid Razr Maxx
reviews.comment: My wife was coming home and I wanted to track her flight.  I installed this version and it was perfect.  I was very impressed by the accuracy of the tracking, even the frequent update of the estimated arrival time without having to constantly hit some refresh button.  As a licensed private pilot, I was going to track her flight as it neared on the radio frequency app, however there was really no need for it.  I was at the baggage claim 5 to 10 minutes ahead of when she got off the flight and I already had her luggage.  This is a fantastic app.   The GUI on this app is also excellent.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need edit date option of saved trips
reviews.comment: This really is an exceptional app.  However I watch flights daily and wish I didn\'t have to input the same trips all over again everyday.  If there was some way to edit the date of the trips I\'ve already saved  this app would be a 5 + plus. HTC Sensation 4g
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: I have this on both my Evo 4G, and my Samsung Tab 2 10.1. Neither is yet to actually be updated with real time information.   Uninstalling as this is no use to me. Be warned.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not Compatible with Custom Rom
reviews.comment: Your device isn\'t compatible with this version....  I bought this app after using the free version for quite a while.   Two weeks after I buy the paid version I upgrade on my phone to a custom version of Android. Now suddenly the app is no longer compatible with my phone.  Six months later... Still no update to program to make it compatible with custom rom ... Oddly the free version still installs without error.  **UPDATE - I contacted the developer and they advised that the program does work with ICS but Google is doing some version checking and blocking installation. They advised making a change to some system files. I will try that and report my findings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Where is ASM?
reviews.comment: Uninstall for not showing a major metro airport
reviews.author: A Google User
